name: Slime Siege
description:
Slime Siege is a hard Roguelite Tower Defense.

Pop slimes, level up and pick strong item combinations that will allow you to survive.



With 5 different weapon types, 7 elements, 40+ upgrades you'll have many ways to overcome the challenges.

Unlock more weapons and upgrades as you complete the quests, use the gold to strengthen yourself between the runs.



Complete challenges unique to each map and get even more items!



Starting tip: focus on collecting weapons of a certain element or type with the appropriate upgrade.
